COMMENTS.MossyMax: for all the pve scaling numbers , alot of base dmg numbers and just being the GOAT
archetypeNotes: because of how infrequently some values vary they have had been made reliant upon defaualts
isExplosive is defaulted to false, if true dmg*critmult is impact. so dmg of 100 and crit mult of 0.3 would be 30 impact
oneAmmoBurst is defaulted to false, if the gun shoots multiple bullets in a "burst" but only uses one ammo per burst set this to true
isCharge is defaulted to false, if the gun has a charge time set this to true
usageNotes: does not subscribe to a consistent schema for easier readability
entries like pve(scalar) and is_fusion in sub family data will not always be populated
if you are using this in a strongly typed language keep that in mind using the propper abstraction for your language
nomenclature: vpp stands for value per point; on the same note evpp stands for exponential value per point
cat stands for category, subFam stands for sub family, magProf stands for mag profile
